issue.title: [CF 905] How can I do like this with TMW?
issue.body:
Hi, I'm wondering I could write question post in here.

I'm in trouble with TMW. What I want to do is here :

Spell : Dark Soul (warlock)

1. when dark soul is active(on buff), show dark soul Icon with its duration text. ( 20 sec.)

2. when dark soul is not active, (after 20 secs) then Icon disappears. (opacity = 0%)

3. 10 seconds before dark soul is ready, then icon appears (opacity > 0% )

How can I do that?


> Posted by CurseForge user takilon | Imported from CurseForge issue #905 | Raw

comments.body:
Download and install the latest alpha version of TellMeWhen from the files tab at the top of this page, and then Import these three icons:

^1^T^SType^Smeta ^SIcons^T ^N1^STMW:icon:1IpV3HYJGfwU ^N2^STMW:icon:1IpV3HYL4la2 ^t^SEnabled^B ^t^N70045^S~`~| ^Sicon^^

^1 ^T^SShowTimer^B ^SType^Sbuff ^SName^SDark~`Soul:~`Instability ^SShowTimerText^B ^SFakeHidden^B ^SGUID^STMW:icon:1IpV3HYJGfwU ^SConditions^T ^Sn^N1 ^t^SEnabled^B ^t^N70045^S~`~| ^Sicon^^

^1 ^T^SShowTimer^B ^SType^Scooldown ^SUnAlpha^N0.5 ^SAlpha^N0.9 ^SName^SDark~`Soul ^SShowWhen^N3 ^SFakeHidden^B ^SGUID^STMW:icon:1IpV3HYL4la2 ^SEnabled^B ^SDurationMaxEnabled^B ^SDurationMax^N10 ^t^N70045^S~`~| ^Sicon^^

Edited Jan 9, 2014

> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

I'm very sorry for making you to be confused.

I want to put above things(1,2,3) into just one icon.

It seems to be you understood that I wanted to put each respectively.

You means that I use Meta Icon?

p.s. Meta Icon seems to work when components of the MetaIcon are active. Is that right?

Edited Jan 8, 2014

> Posted by CurseForge user takilon

The meta icon will show all of these things. The other two icons are the components of the meta icon. You can place them anywhere you want because they will never be shown - only the meta icon will be visible, and it will change based on the rules you outlined in the ticket.

Edited Jan 9, 2014

> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

Cybeloras/

Thanks a lot.

I'll do after work. Have a nice day!


> Posted by CurseForge user takilon

Um.. It didn't work. since two icon which are components of meta icon is set to be hide,

meta icon wasn't shown T.T


> Posted by CurseForge user takilon

It works beautifully for me. Make sure to change the buff/debuff icon's spell if you are using a specialization with a buff that is different from that one.

The two meta icon component's should have the Always Hide setting enabled - that is the entire point of that setting. Make sure you are using the correct version of TellMeWhen to import these as I indicated in my first comment. This will not work in v6.2.6 unless you manually re-configure the meta icon.

Edited Jan 9, 2014

> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

Thanks for your kindness, After work, I'll do that. Thanks again.

Oh, I have one more question. In TMW, the cooldown timer text on icon can be shown.

Is there any way to see the number of tenth digit? like.. 2 -> 2.3

Edited Jan 9, 2014

> Posted by CurseForge user takilon

If you are using OmniCC, configure that with OmniCC. If you are using TMW's built in texts, [Duration:TMWFormatDuration] will do that.
